data.title: Michele LUQUE m:Sarah E. TURNE
data.meta_description: Luque: Descendants of Winslow Turner II and Elizabeth (Be... Read more on Genealogy.com!
data.text:
Descendants of Winslow Turner II and Elizabeth (Betsy) Williams that I can help them extend her ancestral line.

I am working on this WILLIAMS line through

Mrs. Elizabeth "Betsy" (Williams-her maiden name)(Williams)TURNER who married second, Winslow Turner II. I am her grgrgrgrgrandaughter through her first marriage with cousin William Williams.

If you are a descendant of these lines and would like more information on your WILLIAMS hertitage, please contact me. If you have more to share I would love to hear from you.

Sheryl

Without the wisdom and generousity of others I would not be able to continue weaving my incredible family tapestry!

*************

=======

There were THREE Winslow Turners-

-Winslow I who was married twice. His first wife was Molly Sarah Standish--second wife--Elizabeth but no known last name.

His son Winslow Turner II b. ca 1786 -wife--Mrs. Elizabeth "Betsy" Williams, (a widow with a very young son and daughter which Winslow reared as his own)--emig. to the Province of Texas in 1826 from what is now Lincoln Co., MO. with their children. They had eleven children including Malkijah and Teresa Williams.

Their son Winslow Turner III was an Indian fighter plus he fought in the Texas Revolution. b. 1811, m. 1st Sarah Carpenter Sowell, then 2nd Hannah L. Coon; buried in the Texas State Cemetery, Austin, Texas.

-

This is a very historic early Texas Family.

In Texas historical and genealogical information, Winslow II is referred to as Winslow Sr., and Winslow III is referred to as Winslow Jr.

===========

Name: Mary Elizabeth WILLIAMS

Sex: F

Birth: ABT 1787, probably NC.

Death: ABT 1843 in Jackson County, Texas

Father: Alambee WILLIAMS b: 1757 in Dorchester County, Maryland

Mother: Sarah "Sally" WILLIAMS b: UNKNOWN

MARRIAGE 1 - William WILLIAMS (a cousin) b: UNKNOWN

Children of William WILLIAMS and Elizabeth WILLIAMS:

1)Name: Malkijah WILLIAMS

Sex: M

Birth: Abt 1803 in Tennessee

Residence: Jackson Co., Texas

Event: Fact #1 Reared by Winslow Turner II (stepfather) as own child

Census: 1850 Jackson County: Age 46; Born W. Tennessee

Event: Marriage Record 5 DEC 1837 Recorded in Jackson County, Texas Marriage Licences: Vol. A/B, pg. 7

Married Cynthia Ann BURNS b: abt.1813 Missouri, d:Unknown in Texas daughter of Arthur Burns and Cynthia (?).

2)Name: Teresa WILLIAMS

Given Name: Teresa

Surname: Williams

Alias: Teresa Turner

Sex: F

Birth: abt 1809 in Tennessee

Death: 23 Nov 1873 in Bastrop, Texas

Event: Fact #1 Stepdaughter of Winslow Turner II; most often used surname Turner

Census: 1850 Travis County, Texas: #18, Farmer ($1, 000) Burial: Bastrop City Cemetary

Married Samuel HIGHSMITH b:1804 in Boone County, Kentucky, d:10 Jan 1849 in Texas.

---

MARRIAGE 2 - WINSLOW TURNER , JR./II.

b: ABT 1786 in Pembroke, Plymouth, Massachusetts

Married: BEF 1811 in Lincoln County, Missouri

Children of MARY ELIZABETH (Mrs.) WILLIAMS and WINSLOW TURNER II are:

i. Elizabeth "Betty" TURNER died BEF AUG 1845.

ii. Sarah "Sally" TURNER was born 1804 in Upper Cuivre, St. Charles District, Missouri Territory. She married Abraham (Abram) M. CLARE 16 Aug 1828 in Gonzales, DeWitt Colony, Texas. He was born Abt. 1800 in Virginia.

iii. Louisa TURNER was born 8 Feb 1812 in Upper Cuivre, St. Charles District, Missouri Territory, and died 31 May 1896 in Homested near Webberville, TX. She married Joseph Duty 16 Jan 1829, son of Solomon Duty and Susanna(h) Witmore. He was born 6 Mar 1801 in Sumner Co., Tennessee, and died 11 Sep 1855 in Texas.

iv. WINSLOW TURNER III was born 29 JAN 1811 in Upper Cuivre, St. Charles District, Missouri Territory, and died 6 MAY 1880 in McDade, Bastrop County, Texas. He married 1st Sarah Carpenter SOWELL, then 2nd Hannah L. COON; buried in the Texas State Cemetery, Austin, Texas.

v. Mary TURNER was born 21 JAN 1816 in Upper Cuivre, St. Charles District, Missouri Territory, and died 4 SEP 1853 in Victoria County or Goliad County, Texas. She married Samuel Porter MIDDLETON 30 Oct 1833 in Jackson County, Texas, United States. He was born 16 Jun 1806 in South Carolina, United States.

vi. Edwin TURNER was born 1820 in Upper Cuivre, St. Charles District, Missouri Territory, and died 1861 in Civil War. He married Maria (Mrs. O'Neal) KENNEY 27 Dec 1854 in Jackson County, Texas, United States. She was born 15 Aug 1831 in Ireland.

vii. Hiram M. TURNER was born 1822 in Troy, Lincoln County, Missouri.

viii. Stephen Robert TURNER was born 1824 in Missouri, United States, and died 1870 in San Antonio, Bexar Co, Texas, United States. He was buried in Old Campo Santo Cemetery, San Antonio, Bexar Co, Texas, United States. He married1 Henrietta Christina Louisa WEDEMEIR Bet. 1853 - 1854. She was born 2 Feb 1837 in Victoria, Victoria Co, Texas, United States, and died Abt. 1865 in Old Moulton, Texas, United States. He married2 Mary Nancy MCGREGOR 27 Apr 1844 in Gonzales Co, Gonzales, Texas, United States.

***If you are a descendant of these TURNER's and are interested in your WILLIAMS hertitage, please get in contact with me.***

====================================

-------

Posted by: Beth Wilson

http://genforum.genealogy.com/turner/messages/14780.htmlhttp://genforum.genealogy.com/turner/messages/14780.html

Lincoln County Missouri Land Deeds

Volume C, page 405

10 November 1826

Bedford Township

Heirs of Winslow Turner, deceased:

Winslow Turner and wife Betsy; (Elizabeth Williams)

Stephen Cottle and wife Sally; (Sarah Turner)

Abijah M. Highsmith and wife Deborah; (Deborah Turner)

Adam Turner

-------------------

--------------------------------

Found this in my old files, believe it was from GenForum but not certain of the author.

Decendants of Molly Standish and Winslow TURNER.

They were both born in Pembroke, Mass and immigrated to MO. Their son, also Winslow Turner was born in Pembroke Mass, then moved with his parents to Lincoln Co, MO where he married Elizabeth Williams, they moved on to Texas, their son was named Stephen Robert Turner.

I do not have any records on any possible siblings for Stephen, but do have records of the siblings from this point backwards to Myles Standish.

Winslow TURNER and Molly Standish-

To my knowledge their children are:

1. Elias Turner, m. Keziah Barker

2. Winslow Turner, m. Elizabeth Williams

3. Miles S. Turner

4. Sally Turner, m. Stephen Cottle

5. Deborah Turner, m. Abijah M. Highsmith

6. Phebe Turner, m. William Null

7. Mahala Turner, m. Alonzo Cottle

=================================================

====================================

FOUND THIS ON ROOTSWEB.COM

-----

"Orr" RootsWeb family tree

Contact: Nancy Orr-Redburn

http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=REG&db=:589628&id=I24http://wc.rootsweb.com/cgi-bin/igm.cgi?op=REG&db=:589628&id=I24

Stephen Robert TURNER, son of Winslow TURNER II/Jr. and Elizabeth WILLIAMS was born 1824 in Lincoln County, MO, and died 1870 in San Antonio, TX. He married Nancy Mary MACGREGOR 28 APR 1844 in Gonzalez, TX. She was born in Scotland, and died 1850 in Refugio, TX.

Child of Stephen Robert TURNER and Nancy Mary MACGREGOR is:

i. Sarah Elizabeth TURNER was born 3 SEP 1845 in Refugio, TX, and died 1928 in Sinton, TX. She married Michele LUQUE 13 FEB 1862 in Refugio, TX. He was born 8 FEB 1841 in New Orleans, LA, and died 6 MAY 1913 in Sinton, TX.

***YOU WILL FIND MORE DESCENDANTS ON THIS TREE.
